excerpt: "The deal is yet another example of an important trend worth watching as the telecom industry gathers for Mobile World Congress 2021 starting June 28 and eyes its digital future. The cloud is coming, and it will have a profound impact on a space that is ripe for disruption centuries after the invention of the first telephone in the 1870s."
